author: erikdebruin
msg: - added a conditional to check if the badge is running on the same domain as where the config.xml is hosted; if not, the app will use PHP/cURL to get at that XML file, to avoid sandboxing issues;
- introduced 2 sizes of the badge, so the embedding page (using an iframe) can decide how to present the app: regular or small (check README for instructions on how to embed);

author: rvs
msg: BIGTOP-664. hive-metastore script has error when execute 'service hive-metastore status' in Ubuntu precise (Anatoli Fomenko via rvs)

author: rmuir
msg: LUCENE-4309: move license link under About section
